name: Home Is Where The Mech Is
name_original: Home Is Where The Mech Is
description:
This is our game that we made for Global Game Jam 2019, but with an addition of an Offline mode.

The game is a first person shooter where you need to defend your home with your mech! It features twitch integration for streamers so that the Twitch chat can choose and spawn your enemies, or if you prefer this version features has an offline mode.

This game was developed by:

Will Dixon

Daniel Dennis

John Weightman

Tim Weightman

Twitter:

John Weightman - @HF97Damnation

Will Dixon - @WillomenaIV

Daniel Dennis - @dendan_LoL

Emails:

Will Dixon - WillGDixon@Gmail.com

Daniel Dennis DMDennis@protonmail.com

With a special thanks to Scott Bentley who produced the sound effects and background audio!

All donations go to the Let Them Eat Cake charity, supporting the homeless in Lincoln, UK.
